title: Everything You Need To Know About Purchasing Diamonds & Jewelry Ft. The Ring Concierge's Nicole Wegman
itunes:title: Everything You Need To Know About Purchasing Diamonds & Jewelry Ft. The Ring Concierge's Nicole Wegman
description:
#435: On today's episode we are joined by Nicole Wegman, also known for her brand The Ring Concierge. In this episdoe we cover everything you need to know when buying diamonds and jewelry, the history of the diamond business, and how to purchase jewelry that will hold it's value. 

This Episode is Brought To You By Ring Concierge

To learn more and get 15% off at The Ring Concierge click HERE and use code SKINNYRING

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE

For Detailed Show Notes visit TSCPODCAST.COM

To Call the Him & Her Hotline call: 1-833-SKINNYS (754-6697)

Produced by Dear Media
